attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Create a Public Smoking Carnival where it is compulsory for everybody to smoke in public places and all anti smoking legislation is suspended for 7 days.  Anyone caught not smoking in a public place or at least without a packet of fags, should be handed an on the spot penalty of £100 and frog-marched to the nearest ATM.  For repeated disobedience on National Smoking Carnival Week they should be handed an ASBO and told to "lighten up".

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
